name: factoryng
description: An all-in-one angularjs factory that wraps multiple backends
author: Geoffrey Cox

scripts.test: npm run jshint && npm run test-node
scripts.test-firefox: npm run jshint && CLIENT=selenium:firefox npm run test-browser
scripts.test-phantomjs: npm run jshint && CLIENT=selenium:phantomjs npm run test-browser
scripts.build-delta-pouchyng: browserify scripts/adapters/delta-pouchyng-index.js -i angular -i pouchdb -o dist/adapters/delta-pouchyng.js && uglifyjs dist/adapters/delta-pouchyng.js -mc > dist/adapters/delta-pouchyng.min.js
scripts.build-firyng: browserify scripts/adapters/firyng-index.js -i angular -i firebase -o dist/adapters/firyng.js && uglifyjs dist/adapters/firyng.js -mc > dist/adapters/firyng.min.js
scripts.build-memyng: browserify scripts/adapters/memyng-index.js -i angular -o dist/adapters/memyng.js && uglifyjs dist/adapters/memyng.js -mc > dist/adapters/memyng.min.js
scripts.build-pouchyng: browserify scripts/adapters/pouchyng-index.js -i angular -i pouchdb -o dist/adapters/pouchyng.js && uglifyjs dist/adapters/pouchyng.js -mc > dist/adapters/pouchyng.min.js
scripts.build: npm run build-delta-pouchyng && npm run build-firyng && npm run build-memyng && npm run build-pouchyng
scripts.dev: browserify test/test.js > test/test-bundle.js && npm run dev-server
